00020 Segmenter::Segmenter ()
00021     :   inkValue_(0),
00022         shapes_(std::vector<Shape>(0)),
00023         thresholdingTime_(0.0),
00024         shapesFindingTime_(0.0)
00025 {
00026     
00027 };

00035 void Segmenter::applyThreshold (Clip &clip, const unsigned char &threshold, const unsigned char &backgroundReference)
00036 {
00037     // Start timing
00038     boost::timer timer;
00039     timer.restart();
00040     
00041     
00042     // Threshold every pixel
00043     for (unsigned int i=0; i < clip.height(); ++i)
00044     {
00045         for (unsigned int j=0; j < clip.width(); ++j)
00046         {
00047             unsigned char grayLevel = clip(i, j);
00048             
00049             if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel >= threshold) )  // The background is near white
00050                 clip(i, j) = 255;
00051             else
00052             {
00053                 if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )
00054                     clip(i, j) = 0;
00055                 else
00056                 {
00057                     if ( (backgroundReference < threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )    // The background is near black
00058                         clip(i, j) = 0;
00059                     else
00060                         clip(i, j) = 255;
00061                 }
00062             }   
00063         }
00064     }
00065     
00066     
00067     // Stablish the value of the ink pixels
00068     if ( backgroundReference >= threshold )
00069         inkValue_ = 0;
00070     else
00071         inkValue_ = 255;
00072     
00073     // Gather elapsed time
00074     thresholdingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00075 };

00084 void Segmenter::findShapes (const Clip &clip)
00085 {
00086     // Start timing
00087     boost::timer timer;
00088     timer.restart();
00089     
00090     // Find the seeds where the flooding process will start from
00091     std::list<Pixel> seeds;
00092     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < clip.height(); ++i )
00093     {
00094         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < clip.width(); ++j )
00095         {
00096             if ( clip(i, j) == inkValue_ )
00097                 seeds.push_back(Pixel(i, j));
00098         }
00099     }
00100     
00101     
00102     // A vector of "visited/non visited" status for the pixels in the clip
00103     std::vector<bool> visited(clip.size(), false);
00104     
00105     
00106     // Explore the neighbourhood of each seed. For each pixel explored, the vector above tells if it has already been explored
00107     std::list<Pixel>::iterator seedsIterator;
00108     for (  seedsIterator = seeds.begin(); seedsIterator not_eq seeds.end(); ++seedsIterator )
00109     {
00110         unsigned int row    = (*seedsIterator).first;
00111         unsigned int column = (*seedsIterator).second;
00112         
00113         if ( not visited.at(row * clip.width() + column) )  // This seed has not already been visited
00114         {
00115             visited.at(row * clip.width() + column) = true;
00116             
00117             // This seed begins a new shape
00118             shapes_.push_back(Shape());
00119             shapes_.back().addPixel( Pixel(row, column) );
00120             
00121             
00122             // Explore the seed's neighbourhood
00123             for ( unsigned int i = row-1; (i <= row+1) and (i < clip.height()); ++i )
00124             {
00125                 for ( unsigned int j = column-1; (j <= column+1) and (j < clip.width()); ++j )
00126                 {
00127                     // Test clip borders are not passed
00128                     if ( i >= 0 and j >= 0 )
00129                     {
00130                         // Add this neighbour if has ink and has already not been visited
00131                         if ( clip(i,j) == inkValue_ and not visited.at(i * clip.width() + j) )
00132                         {
00133                             visited.at(i * clip.width() + j) = true;
00134                             shapes_.back().addPixel( Pixel(i, j) );
00135                         }
00136                     }
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             
00140             
00141             // Explore the neighbours of the neighbours of the seed.
00142             unsigned int index = 1;
00143             while ( shapes_.back().size() > index )
00144             {
00145                 Pixel pixel( shapes_.back()(index) );
00146                 
00147                 // Explore the neighbour's neighbourhood
00148                 for ( unsigned int i = pixel.first-1; (i <= pixel.first+1) and (i < clip.height()); ++i )
00149                 {
00150                     for ( unsigned int j = pixel.second-1; (j <= pixel.second+1) and (j < clip.width()); ++j )
00151                     {
00152                         // Test clip borders are not passed
00153                         if ( i >= 0 and j >= 0 )
00154                         {
00155                             // Add this neighbour if has ink and has already not been visited
00156                             if ( clip(i,j) == inkValue_ and not visited.at(i * clip.width() + j) )
00157                             {
00158                                 visited.at(i * clip.width() + j) = true;
00159                                 shapes_.back().addPixel( Pixel(i, j) );
00160                             }
00161                         }
00162                     }
00163                 }
00164                 index++;
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170     // Gather elapsed time
00171     shapesFindingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00172 };
